actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to suspend the imposition of interest on underpayments of tax resulting from erroneous advice given in writing by the Internal Revenue Service.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt taxpayers from the payment of interest on tax deficiencies attributable to erroneous advice obtained in writing from an Internal Revenue Service officer or employee acting in his official capacity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to suspend the imposition of interest on underpayments of tax resulting from erroneous advice given in writing by the Internal Revenue Service.
